entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:05 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:05 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
